name: Bus seat booking system
short_description:
The Online Bus Reservation system facilitates the user to view the bus schedules, enquire about the bus details, availability of seats and many more. The major functionality of system is to allow the user to book and cancel the bus tickets as per user requirements.
Major features provided by the system are:

1. Bus Enquiry 
The system allows the user or member to perform bus enquiry including bus scheduling,     seats availability status, fare details, etc.

2. User Registration
It allows the user to register in order to be a member of the system. User is then granted privileges to book or cancel tickets.

3. Bus Ticket Reservation 
The system allows the member to book the tickets as per his/her requirements. The member is prompt to enter the passenger details. 
4. Bus Ticket Cancellation
The functionality is used by the member to cancel an existing reservation made by the member earlier.
5. Bus Supplier Management
summary: Portal for Bus Seat Booking System
